definition: as for/as to/to go so far as to
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
down to/up to/to the extent that...
unlikely to go so far as to/not as bad as

sentences.english: As for whether he will visit the DPRK, I am not aware of such an arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 至于他是否去朝鲜，目前我没有听说有这方面的安排。

sentences.english: In terms of the syllabus, it's going to be online.
sentences.chinese: 至于教学大纲，网上会有。

sentences.english: As for the lack of overtaking, the Ferrari man had no miracle solution.
sentences.chinese: 至于缺乏超车，这位法拉利车手没有什么好的办法。

sentences.english: There is widespread speculation about what caused their disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 至于他们消失的原因有好多种推测。

sentences.english: I can't, I can't do this. I'm so excited that I can't eat lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我实在太兴奋了，以至于我都没法吃午餐了。

sentences.english: Flossing is probably skipped by the majority of men out there.
sentences.chinese: 至于牙线，更是被很多人忽视。

sentences.english: As to the 3rd, have to count roundlet desk to go up that " antependium " .
sentences.chinese: 至于第三嘛，就得数小圆桌上的那块“桌布”了。

sentences.english: Make sure you drink plenty to save-off dehydration .
sentences.chinese: 记得喝多点水才不至于虚脱。

sentences.english: I am sure every one has certain feeling about those invisible accumulations.
sentences.chinese: 至于无形沉潜的那部分，我想大家都有过体会。

sentences.english: As for the congratulations from De Rossi, our friendship goes beyond football.
sentences.chinese: 至于德罗西的祝贺，我想说我们的友情超越了足球。

sentences.english: That they buy T-shirts for and spout off about endlessly?
sentences.chinese: 无非就是买了件t恤什么的至于说个没完嘛。

sentences.english: The wall is so short that they can climb over.
sentences.chinese: 这堵墙矮到如此程度，以至于他们可以爬过去。

sentences.english: As for Mahmood, he became more courageous from that day onward.
sentences.chinese: 至于马哈茂德，从那一天起他变得更加勇敢了。

sentences.english: As for the fluorescent powder quality sorting, yanchao lights available comparison test. & k2 ]!
sentences.chinese: 至于荧光粉品质的分选，可用验钞灯作对比检验。

sentences.english: As for the film itself, I can simply report that it isn't too bad at all.
sentences.chinese: 至于影片本身，我只能说，还不算糟糕透顶。

sentences.english: As for Cambodia, the media's themes were familiar.
sentences.chinese: 至于柬埔寨，新闻界的调子是久已熟知的。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
